text:
actions (tocograph) 

NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
68 
E
lements of the trace to be assessed 
The interpretation of CTGs is dealt with in detail in guidelines produced by FIGO and NICE and the latest versions of 
these can be consulted for more info. A summary of the core aspects is included here. 
Contractions 
• Assess duration, frequency, form and relationship to the FHR.
• Uterine action should be considered excessive if there are more than 5 c
